This method is used in vanilla Foreign minister.

{{{
	local acceptanceChance = action2:GetAIAcceptance()
	acceptanceChance = acceptanceChance - ai:GetSpamPenalty(countryTag)
	if ( factor > 0.01 and acceptanceChance > 50 ) then
}}}

==CChangeLawCommand==
implements [#CCommand CCommand]

===Constructor summary===
||  *Type*                                                            ||  *Constructor*                                                                                             ||  *Since*||  
|| [#CChangeLawCommand CChangeLawCommand]   ||  `CChangeLawCommand(`[#CCountryTag CCountryTag]` actor, `[#CLaw CLaw]` law, `[#CLawGroup CLawGroup]` lawGroup)`

===Constructor detail===
{{{
	-- see if we can get a better law
	for group in CLawDataBase.GetGroups() do
		local group_key = tostring(group:GetKey())
		if not ( group_key == 'education_investment_law' or group_key == 'training_laws') then
			local newLaw = nil
			local currentLaw = ministerCountry:GetLaw( group )
			local index = currentLaw:GetIndex() + 1
			if index < CLawDataBase.GetNumberOfLaws() then
				newLaw = CLawDataBase.GetLaw( index )
				if not (group:GetIndex() == newLaw:GetGroup():GetIndex()) then 
					newLaw = nil
				end
			end
			if newLaw and newLaw:ValidFor( ministerTag ) then
				--Utils.LUA_DEBUGOUT(tostring(ministerTag) .. " - NEW LAW " .. tostring( newLaw:GetKey() ) .. " from - " .. tostring(group:GetKey()) )
				local command = CChangeLawCommand( ministerTag, newLaw, group )
				ai:Post( command )
			end
		end		
	end
}}}
